archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.2.5d: d) using Transport Layer Security (TLS) certificates that have been obtained from a reputable, approved internal or ideally an external (i.e. public) Certification Authority.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
